title: Aldi & CVS on S College Road traffic.  How are you planning to cut back bushes behind CVS? Traffic is horrible now, without the traffic from Aldi.  Can't you limit the Waltmor side of Aldi be entrance only like Trader Joes?
text: This website is a service of StarNews Media not of the city of Wilmington or of the N.C. Department of Transportation, so there is nothing we can do about development, planning or roads in the area, but you can read about future developments in the StarNews or at StarNewsOnline.com.
